text: Blondie of the Follies is a 1932 American comedy movie directed by Edmund Goulding and starring Marion Davies, Robert Montgomery, Billie Dove. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Other websites == * Category:1932 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Edmund Goulding Category:MGM movies
title: Blondie of the Follies
